author: Reuters Editorial
title: Granite Construction Says Under Deal With Layne Christensen, Co To Receive From Layne Termination Fee Of $16 Mln Under Certain Circumstances
text: Market News February 14, 2018 / 7:48 PM / Updated 27 minutes ago BRIEF-Granite Construction Says Under Deal With Layne Christensen, Co To Receive From Layne Termination Fee Of $16 Mln Under Certain Circumstances Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 14 (Reuters) - Granite Construction Inc: * GRANITE CONSTRUCTION- UNDER DEAL WITH LAYNE CHRISTENSEN, CO TO RECEIVE FROM LAYNE TERMINATION FEE OF $16 MILLION UNDER CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES - SEC FILING Source text ( bit.ly/2HhgpuC ) Further company coverage:
